questions.question: Q1. Pole of a system lies on the imaginary axis of the S-plane, then the system is:_______
Q2. Which one of the following rules determines the mapping of the S-plane to the Z-plane?

answers.a: The right half of the S-plane maps to the exterior of the unit circle in the Z-plane
answers.b: The left half of the S-plane maps to the interior of the unit circle in the Z-plane
answers.c: The imaginary axis in the s-plane maps to the circumference of the unit circle in the Z-plane

questions.question: Q3. The transformation technique in which there is one to one mapping from s-domain to z-domain is

answers.a: Many to one mapping from s-domain to z-domain
answers.b: One to one mapping from s-domain to z-domain
answers.c: One to many mapping from s-domain to z-domain
answers.d: Many to many mapping from s-domain to z-domain

questions.question: Q5. Pole of a system lies on the unit cirle in the z-plane, then the system is:
